name: Perpetuating Technologies
overview:
Perpetuating Technologies is actively engaged in managing IT strategy and direction for many of the top companies in the New England and New York areas. Perpetuating provides IT consulting, QMS development, software development and outsourcing services. Perpetuating has helped launch several startups, as well as leading businesses to successfully achieve their IT goals.

Perpetuating is currently engaged in growing its second offshore office to support growth in Asia and to supply technology solutions to companies throughout the United States and Europe. Current Projects include work within the Pharmaceutical 50, Insurance, Healthcare, Mobile and Wireless companies.

PTI offers strategic development partnerships that give you an additional development team that can scale up quickly, supplement onshore skills, and provide extensive cost savings. Our outsourcing partners have saved up to 60% while experiencing greater efficiencies, improved quality, and enhanced IT / business alignment.
